org.akubraproject.mux
Class MuxBlob

java.lang.Object
  org.akubraproject.impl.AbstractBlob
      org.akubraproject.impl.BlobWrapper
          org.akubraproject.mux.MuxBlob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Blob
public class MuxBlob
extends BlobWrapper

A wrapped blob for use by implementations of AbstractMuxConnection. This ensures that AbstractBlob.getConnection() returns the connection from the mux store layer rather than the backing store. Additionally this supports moveTo(URI, Map) across blob stores using moveByCopy(Blob, URI, URI).

Author:
Pradeep Krishnan

Method Detail

moveTo

public Blob moveTo(URI blobId,
                   Map<String,String> hints)
            throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Blob
Move this blob under the new id. Before the move, this blob must exist and the destination blob must not. After the move, this blob will not exist but the destination blob will.

Specified by:
moveTo in interface Blob
Overrides:
moveTo in class BlobWrapper
Parameters:
blobId - the blob id; may be null if the store supports id-generation
hints - A set of hints to allow the implementation to optimize the operation (can be null)
Returns:
the resulting Blob from the move
Throws:
UnsupportedIdException - if blobId is not in a recognized/usable pattern by this store
MissingBlobException - if this blob does not exist
DuplicateBlobException - if a blob with blobId already exists
IOException - if an error occurs while attempting the operation

moveByCopy

protected void moveByCopy(Blob blob,
                          URI thisStore,
                          URI otherStore)
                   throws IOException,
                          DuplicateBlobException,
                          MissingBlobException
Performs a moveTo(URI, Map) operation by copy since the blobs are in different stores.

Parameters:
blob - the destination
thisStore - the store where this Blob exists
otherStore - the store where the destination Blob should exist
Throws:
IOException - on an error in copy
DuplicateBlobException - if a blob with the same id as the destination blob exists in the destination blob store
MissingBlobException - if this blob does not exist
